main.name: Kevin Patel
main.description: A recent Computer Science graduate from Deakin University with High Distinction average (among top 15%)
main.bio:
“There’s always something more to learn, some more problems to solve and some more to build.“

I am a data-driven and an insightful person who is passionate about technologies revolving around Web and Data. From studying bachelors in Computer Science to pursuing internships, I’ve grown my skills in software development, building websites, data preparation and analysis. I'm a self-taught Frontend Developer and Python programmer.

 Discussing opportunities over a cup of coffee is never a bad idea. Feel free to reach out if I can be of any help or if you feel like we could collaborate on something innovative.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to have a chat.
